text.section: This section applies to Queen Anne's County.

section.section: The Board of License Commissioners may issue a wine tasting (WT) alcoholic beverages license.
A WT license authorizes, for tasting or sampling only, the on-premises consumption of wine that contains not more than 22% of alcohol by volume.
Notwithstanding any other law, the license may be issued to a holder of a Class A beer, wine and liquor license or a Class A beer and wine license.

The licensee may serve:
Not more than 2 ounces from each given brand to any one person; and
Not more than 4 ounces to any one person in a single day.
The annual license fee for a WT license is $100 in addition to the fee for any other alcoholic beverages license.

text.section: The Board of License Commissioners may adopt regulations to carry out this section.
